title: Deadwood trees
text: Several trees have dead branches that need to be removed. The lawn above the garage entrance is particularly bad right now.

title: Refill tree bags
text: Head of ravine, parking lot, Glenn garden, south of pool.

title: Investigate dying viburnum
text: Remove dead branches. Pull English ivy and ailanthus from the base.

title: Water lilacs
text: All seven in the parking lot are getting dry.

title: Pick up fallen sticks
text: Last wind storms dropped a lot of sticks and branches.

title: Ask John for help
text: Why isn't my handler correctly interpreting the id that's being passed to it?
